skills.name: Alchemy
skills.description: Brew potions, refine ingredients, and push experimental mixtures.

slots.name: Yield
slots.description: Increase the number of doses produced when brewing.

slots.name: Potency
slots.description: Increase the strength and effectiveness of brewed potions.

slots.name: Precision
slots.description: Improve reliability and reduce waste during brewing.

slots.name: Stability
slots.description: Reduce mishaps and dangerous side effects.

slots.name: Efficiency
slots.description: Lower ingredient consumption and reduce waste.

slots.name: Extraction
slots.description: Harvest more usable essence from raw ingredients.

slots.name: Refinement
slots.description: Process components into higher-quality materials.

slots.name: Speed
slots.description: Reduce brewing time under pressure.

slots.name: Experimentation
slots.description: Attempt experimental and unconventional recipes.

slots.name: Mastery
slots.description: Unlock higher-tier and advanced alchemical recipes.

slots.name: Preservation
slots.description: Improve storage stability and shelf life.

slots.name: Volatility
slots.description: Push brews beyond safe limits for greater reward at greater risk.

skills.name: Herbalism
skills.description: Harvest, cultivate, and prepare botanical ingredients.

slots.name: Foraging
slots.description: Increase quantity of herbs gathered.

slots.name: Identification
slots.description: Reveal hidden plant properties.

slots.name: Cultivation
slots.description: Grow herbs more efficiently.

slots.name: Drying
slots.description: Preserve harvested plants without losing potency.

slots.name: Distillation
slots.description: Extract stronger botanical essences.

slots.name: Toxicology
slots.description: Safely handle poisonous flora.

slots.name: Restoration
slots.description: Improve healing potential of medicinal plants.

slots.name: Hybridization
slots.description: Combine plant traits into rare variants.

slots.name: Resilience
slots.description: Reduce spoilage and environmental degradation.

slots.name: Preparation
slots.description: Increase efficiency converting herbs to components.

slots.name: Experimentation
slots.description: Attempt unconventional botanical recipes.

slots.name: Mastery
slots.description: Unlock higher-tier botanical recipes.

skills.name: Poisoncraft
skills.description: Create toxins, venoms, and subtle debilitating agents.

slots.name: Toxic Potency
slots.description: Increase the strength of applied poisons.

slots.name: Application
slots.description: Improve success when coating weapons or food.

slots.name: Stealth Blending
slots.description: Reduce chance of detection in prepared toxins.

slots.name: Resistance Bypass
slots.description: Improve effectiveness against resilient targets.

slots.name: Extraction
slots.description: Harvest venom and toxins more efficiently.

slots.name: Stability
slots.description: Prevent toxins from degrading prematurely.

slots.name: Dilution
slots.description: Create multiple doses from a single batch.

slots.name: Catalysts
slots.description: Enhance toxins with secondary effects.

slots.name: Volatility
slots.description: Create unstable but devastating poisons.

slots.name: Ingestion Craft
slots.description: Specialize in edible and drinkable toxins.

slots.name: Contact Agents
slots.description: Improve effectiveness of skin-contact poisons.

slots.name: Mastery
slots.description: Unlock rare and legendary toxins.

skills.name: Cooking
skills.description: Prepare meals that restore, empower, and sustain.

slots.name: Portions
slots.description: Increase servings produced per recipe.

slots.name: Flavor Balance
slots.description: Improve quality and morale bonuses from meals.

slots.name: Preservation
slots.description: Extend shelf life of prepared food.

slots.name: Nutrition
slots.description: Increase restorative effects of meals.

slots.name: Efficiency
slots.description: Reduce ingredient waste during preparation.

slots.name: Heat Control
slots.description: Improve outcomes based on temperature precision.

slots.name: Butchery
slots.description: Increase yield from harvested meat.

slots.name: Baking
slots.description: Improve baked goods and endurance-based meals.

slots.name: Spices
slots.description: Add secondary buffs through rare seasonings.

slots.name: Speed Prep
slots.description: Reduce cooking time.

slots.name: Experimentation
slots.description: Attempt unconventional and fusion dishes.

slots.name: Mastery
slots.description: Unlock legendary feasts and signature dishes.
